response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would significantly enhance your endeavors and contribute greatly to your success. Given its intrinsic value and the impact it can have on your business or personal projects, I am confident that this product will be a valuable asset to you.

After careful consideration, I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant discount compared to its market value, which reflects my desire to make this opportunity accessible to someone who truly appreciates its potential.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am more than happy to discuss any further details or answer any questions you might have about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this exceptional product into your hands.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
